events.message: I placed an order two weeks ago, but it still hasn't arrived. The tracking hasn't updated for several days, and I am worried about the delay.
The customer's message indicates a problem related to the shipment delay and tracking issues, categorized under Delivery Delay.
A customer service agent has been assigned to handle the delayed delivery case for this order.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. I understand your concern regarding the delay, and I will do my best to assist you.
Could you please provide your order number and the shipping address so I can check the status with our courier?
Sure, my order number is 123456789, and the shipping address is 123 Maple Street, Springfield.
I have contacted the shipping company and they reported a delay due to weather conditions. Your package should arrive within the next 3 business days.
Thank you for the update. While the delay is frustrating, I appreciate you checking and letting me know the expected delivery window.
Your issue has been marked as resolved given the confirmed shipment update and estimated delivery date.
Just following up to ensure your package arrived safely. Please let us know if you need any further assistance.
We are closing this case as the delivery issue has been resolved successfully. Thank you for your patience.
A customer satisfaction survey has been sent to help us improve our service based on your experience.
